### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #17918 (qt: Hide non PKHash-Addresses in signing address book by emilengler)

If you consider this pull request importan
<!--cf906140f33d8803c4a75a2196329ecb-->\nüêô This pull request conflicts with the target branch and [needs rebase](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#rebasing-changes).

#17918 doesn't solve the GUI messages on AddressBookPage for sign and verify case, when the user open the dialog from sign and verify message. Also modify walletmodel that's not necessary. @jonasschnelli could you take a look on this solution?
Concept ACK. Will have a closer look soon.

@luke-jr hope it's better now, i'm not so good with PR titles :)

Giving more details here:
I implemented your suggestion: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17918/files#r371023931

Working on that solution i also found the AddressBookPage was using the GUI messages for `SendingTab` and `ReceivingTab` showing wrong messages and window title for the user, also fixed that
@10xcryptodev Can you reopen this PR over in the new [GUI repo](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui)?
@fanquake sure, i will open in the repo, thanks
